channel.title: Broken-Grounds on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in Broken-Grounds on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: 02 Apr 2017 00:00
item.description: A coffee date (read breakfast) at the Broken Grounds Cafe. Pretty tiny place with a small seating area. Food was pretty good and seemed to have quite a few vegan options. The house coffee I had was a bit on the bitter side. Should have checked before ordering. Highly likely we won’t be revisiting but definitely worth stopping by once…
